health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Mwidani, Hon. Samba, Hon. Nzai, Hon. Fadhili Makarani, Hon. Milka Moraa, Hon. Ibrahim, Hon. Murfad Amur, Hon. Mwaega Nyiro
health_data_challenges: Lack of awareness in villages, language barrier, payment of hospital bills, decongesting hospitals, burial preparations
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Extend financial assistance to patients unable to pay bills, decongest hospitals by assisting recovered patients to quarantine at home, provide directives for immediate burials at home to reduce gatherings
health_sector_decisions: Adjournment of the County Assembly due to COVID-19, prayer for God's help to overcome the pandemic
health_evidence_base: COVID-19 pandemic, global COVID-19 statistics, challenges faced by other countries, need for awareness in villages, hospital situations, and burial practices
